post:
Hello all,

Looking for a cheap VPS with high-end specifications? We offer the lowest pricing in the market yet you will get a VPS with amazing specs & features.

What you get with this offer:

  • KVM VPS with Virtualizor control panel.
  • 1 vCPU Xeon Silver 4214 (Fair share CPU usage)
  • 512 MB / 1024 MB or 1536 MB dedicated RAM (configurable)
  • 7 GB / 10 GB or 15 GB NVMe only SSD disk drive (configurable)
  • 10 GBps down / 2 GBps upload (Shared)
  • 256GB/512GB/1TB traffic (configurable) - Capped to 10 mbit unlimited when fully used.
  • Location: Frankfurt, Germany.
  • OS: Most Linux distros. Any ISO on request (No Windows sorry).
  • 1x IPv4 address
  • 1x /80 IPv6 subnet
  • Fully managable DDoS Protection (+Discord/E-mail attack notifications).
  • Instant setup. (Depending on stock and fraud check - Please use valid info).
  • 30-day money back guarantee.
  • These specs min € 16 to max € 22,- each year! (depending on configuration) plus VAT (if you’re from Europe).

Direct order link: https://minikvm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=11

Make sure to read the ToS before you order: https://minikvm.com/terms-of-service/
Network info and test: https://minikvm.com/network/
Most asked questions: https://minikvm.com/faq/

Any questions? Reply here or visit our Livechat on our website, sent us an email or use our Telegram support! (see below for phone number).

We accept Paypal, Credit Card, iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@minikvm.com

Our company info:

MiniKVM (by NOVOS BV). We’re a company located in Belgium
You can find our company info here: https://kbopub.economie.fgov.be/kbopub/toonondernemingps.html?ondernemingsnummer=728513847
